column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The crust is so unique: crispy
column3: and slightly crumbly almost like a pie crust but savory and not as thick as you'd think! There was a generous amount of stretchy
column4: gooey cheese. The sauce is so flavorful and bright
column5: and I really appreciate the literal layer of sausage so that you don't miss it in any bite. Be warned though
column6: you're gonna feel the food coma afterwards. But it's worth it.
